jumbo.electronics.desc1: To meet my open-minded colleagues' expectations, on 18.11.2022 I began teaching electronics classes, whose main goal is to develop a passion for creating electronic circuits.
jumbo.electronics.desc2: To the fullest extent of my abilities, I offer assistance in exploring one of the most interesting and engaging field of science.
jumbo.atitle4: Scholarship - ALO PWr and the EU Programme
jumbo.adesc1: Having obtained a 95% score on the physics exam, I received a 'very good' grade in the national competition 'Studium Talent'.
jumbo.adesc2: I obtained the laureate title in mathematics. It guaranteed me the highest score in the high school recruitment process.
jumbo.adesc3: During 2022-2023, I teach electronics classes at ALO PWr, helping the participants develop electronic knowledge.
jumbo.adesc4: During 2020/2021, I was a beneficiary of a scholarship 'Akademickie LO - szkoÅ‚a konstruktywnego myÅ›lenia i dziaÅ‚ania' programme.
jumbo.adesc5: For outstanding academic performance in the 2021/2022 school year, I received a scholarship from the WrocÅ‚aw City Council.
jumbo.adesc6: For my academic performance during 2017-2019, I was awarded three scholarships by the mayor of Gmina Strzegom.
